data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Kujawsko-Pomorskie who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Kujawsko-Pomorskie do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Kujawsko-Pomorskie will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Tatar people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tatar people know you.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Kujawsko-Pomorskie, Poland that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Father, move the 6,420 believers in the state of Kujawsko-Pomorskie to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

location.name: Kujawsko-Pomorskie
